Name: Ask PlayStation UK
Post Title: @Grasser35 It's a regional clash - even if it's the same game, they are treated as different versions of it, which is why the add-ons purchased on the UK store won't 'see' your version of the game and install. ^NL

Contents: @adamtoth96 Hi! I'm sorry to hear this. If you've not changed any settings on your console, and your TV supports HDR, then this is likely caused by an issue with the HDMI cable. I'd suggest trying a new HDMI cable, preferably one that is HDMI 2.0 (or higher). ^AH
Author: @AskPS_UK
Name: Ask PlayStation UK
Post Title: @adamtoth96 Hi! I'm sorry to hear this. If you've not changed any settings on your console, and your TV supports HDR, then this is likely caused by an issue with the HDMI cable. I'd suggest trying a new HDMI cable, preferably one that is HDMI 2.0 (or higher). ^AH

Contents: @M_JaffaCake Hi! I'm sorry to hear this. You need double the space to be available.This is because when the console installs something it needs to download it & then copy it. It should say how much more space you need to clear, clear that amount & you should be fine. ^AH

Name: Ask PlayStation UK
Post Title: @M_JaffaCake Hi! I'm sorry to hear this. You need double the space to be available.This is because when the console installs something it needs to download it & then copy it. It should say how much more space you need to clear, clear that amount & you should be fine. ^AH

Contents: @larsiusprime From my experiences with Game Pass, PSNow, Origin Access: - perfect for singleplayer: play the main story once and never touch the game again (quick 100%s also work) - less expensive even if you only play one or two games per month - no bad purchases - occasional big discounts

Name: typjk
Post Title:
@larsiusprime From my experiences with Game Pass, PSNow, Origin Access:
- perfect for singleplayer: play the main story once and never touch the game again (quick 100%s also work)
- less expensive even if you only play one or two games per month
- no bad purchases
- occasional big discounts
